instruction: Describe a given figure in detail.
output: This figure portrays a ram. It is a medium-sized male sheep with curved, curved horns, a short muzzle and long, woolly coat. The colour of the coat is brown, fading to a lighter brown on the underbelly. Its horns are tan and curved back towards the neck. It has hooves that are broad and white, with a black streak along the middle. The ram has a determined, confident expression on its face. Its eyes are dark and alert, and its ears are alert and upright.
